name: Planted Spy - GBJam 10
description:
You can play in web and in a gameboy/emulator

------Planted Spy-------

The spy agency assigns you a mission to sabotage 4 machines in an enemy base. But no one can know you were there.

Using a plant disguise with the most advanced camouflage technology infiltrate the enemy base, activate the 4 machines, and leave without them knowing, because if they see you, you will not live to tell the tale.

------Controls-------

D-Pad ->  Arrows/WASD

A button -> Alt/J/Z

Start  -> Enter
